# termistyle

> CSS-like styling library for terminal UIs in Go. Build beautiful terminal interfaces with flexbox layouts, 24-bit RGB colors, borders, and text styling.

Key features:
- Flexbox layout engine powered by Yoga
- 24-bit RGB colors for foreground and background
- Multiple border styles with titles and per-side configuration
- Text styling with bold, italic, underline, alignment, wrapping
- Absolute positioning with z-index layering
- Overflow control with clipping support

Render pipeline: Style -> Box Tree -> Layout (Yoga) -> Buffer -> ANSI Output

## API Reference

- [termistyle.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/termistyle.go): Public API facade with all re-exported types and functions
- [style/style.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/style.go): Style struct with all layout and visual properties
- [style/color.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/color.go): Color type using hex strings (#RRGGBB)
- [style/border.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/border.go): Border styles, edges, and helper functions
- [style/display.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/display.go): Display, Position, Overflow, Flex enums
- [style/spacing.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/spacing.go): Padding and Margin helpers
- [style/text.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/style/text.go): Text styling properties (weight, decoration, alignment)
- [layout/box.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/layout/box.go): Box tree structure and Calculate method
- [layout/yoga.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/layout/yoga.go): Yoga flexbox integration
- [draw/text.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/draw/text.go): Text rendering to buffer
- [draw/border.go](https://github.com/termisquad/x/blob/main/termistyle/draw/border.go): Border rendering to buffer
